SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation

Class DatasetEvaluator

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation.DatasetEvaluator
public class DatasetEvaluator extends Object
Evaluator that combines a SingleResourceEvaluator with a Dataset, enabling FHIRPath evaluation that returns CollectionDataset results.

This class bridges the gap between the Column-based evaluation provided by SingleResourceEvaluator and Dataset-aware operations that need both the evaluation result and the underlying data.

Use this evaluator when:

  • You need to evaluate FHIRPath expressions and get both the result columns and the dataset
  • You're working with test scenarios that need to verify expression results against data
  • You need CollectionDataset output for downstream operations like canonicalization
See Also:
  • SingleResourceEvaluator
  • CollectionDataset
  • DatasetEvaluatorBuilder

  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull public CollectionDataset evaluate(@Nonnull FhirPath fhirPath)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression with the default input context.

      The default input context is the subject resource, equivalent to calling evaluate(FhirPath, Collection) with the subject resource collection.

      Parameters:
      fhirPath - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation paired with the dataset

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull public CollectionDataset evaluate(@Nonnull FhirPath fhirPath, @Nonnull Collection inputContext)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression with a custom input context.

      The input context is the collection that the FHIRPath expression operates on. This is typically used when evaluating expressions in the context of a specific element rather than the resource root.

      Parameters:
      fhirPath - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      inputContext - the input context collection to evaluate against
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation paired with the dataset

    • evaluateToCollection

      @Nonnull public Collection evaluateToCollection(@Nonnull FhirPath fhirPath)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression and returns just the Collection result.

      This method is useful when you need the evaluation result without the dataset, such as when only the column expressions are needed.

      Parameters:
      fhirPath - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      Returns:
      the evaluation result as a Collection

    • evaluateToCollection

      @Nonnull public Collection evaluateToCollection(@Nonnull FhirPath fhirPath, @Nonnull Collection inputContext)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression and returns just the Collection result.

      This method is useful when you need the evaluation result without the dataset, such as when only the column expressions are needed.

      Parameters:
      fhirPath - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      inputContext - the input context collection to evaluate against
      Returns:
      the evaluation result as a Collection

    • getSubjectResourceCode

      @Nonnull public String getSubjectResourceCode()
      Returns the subject resource code for this evaluator.

      This method supports both standard FHIR resource types (e.g., "Patient", "Observation") and custom resource types (e.g., "ViewDefinition").

      Returns:
      the subject resource type code

    • getDefaultInputContext

      @Nonnull public ResourceCollection getDefaultInputContext()
      Returns the default input context (subject resource collection).

      This is the initial input context used when evaluating FHIRPath expressions that start from the resource root.

      Returns:
      the subject resource collection
